amendment.description: Amendment replaces language to clarify that shareholders may meet in special meetings held in lieu of the annual meeting.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to clarify that shareholders may meet in special meetings held in lieu of the annual meeting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Roskam.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
